headline: Solar Foods Opens First Commercial Solein Production Plant
summary: Finnish company Solar Foods starts commercial production of Solein, a protein made from air and electricity.

headline: Modern Synthesis Raises $4.1M to Scale Microbial Textile Platform
summary: Funding accelerates development of sustainable textiles using microbial biofabrication to replace leather and synthetics.

headline: Mylo Mushroom Leather Featured in New Luxury Handbag Line
summary: Bolt Threads' Mylo mushroom leather is used in a new line of high-end handbags, showcasing its potential.

headline: Air Protein Partners with NASA for Space Food Research
summary: Air Protein partners with NASA to explore using gas fermentation to create food for space exploration.

headline: Change Foods Secures Funding for Animal-Free Dairy Production
summary: Change Foods receives funding to scale up production of dairy proteins made via precision fermentation.

headline: Remilk Announces Expansion into US Market
summary: Precision-fermentation dairy company Remilk announces plans to launch its products in the United States.

headline: The EVERY Co. Launches Animal-Free Egg White Protein
summary: The EVERY Co. releases its first product: an egg white protein made without chickens via precision fermentation.

headline: Mango Materials Announces New PHA Production Facility
summary: Mango Materials is building a new facility to increase production of PHA, a biodegradable plastic alternative.
